Html:
Hi all, not sure if I am not doing this correctly or if Rawr doesn't support it, but is there a way to update specific items from the armory using thier item ID?

I was trying to see if the Arena 0.5 shoulders are better than my current shoulders but when I added the ID and tried to update the cache it would just delete the item. For some reason the arena 0.5 stuff doesn't show up on the list of item upgrades from the armoury either although the item is definitely on there.

You can add specific items by going to Tools > Item Editor..., and clicking Add.
You can update specific items by right clicking on them pretty much anywhere on the main form, and clicking Refresh Item Data.
Any items which are not on the Armory (ie, most 2.4 stuff still), will cause an error.
